file_content.text: Help is on the way, Harlan. Zess out.
We're out of medpacs, but there are some caches you can raid on your way to Harlan. Here are the coordinates.
I'll grab the medpacs and back Harlan up right away.
Agreed.
I already have a medic.
Captain Dorne can treat Harlan's wounded men.
Lieutenant Dorne can handle a few blaster wounds--no need for supplies.
Not knowing the condition of the wounded, sir, I still recommend collecting additional medical supplies.
Watch and learn, Zess.
I'm sure Harlan will be impressed at the backup he's getting.
If the situation is as bad as Harlan says, I could use an extra gun.
You're not coming?
Me? I'm good in a fight, but I'm not Havoc Squad material. I'd just get in your way.
Stay on your toes out there. This place is a madhouse.
Power packs... check. Stun baton... check. Binders... check.
Excuse me, Captain. I was told you could help me locate Dagger Wing's CO.
Hmm? Ah, Major, glad you caught me. Was just heading out to round up another wave of runners.
The Imps are springing everyone they can. The Daggers volunteered to help get things under control--so they're spread out across the prison.
Can you put me in contact with Conrad Gall?
What about their leader?
Gall's in one of the higher-security zones, so my comm won't reach him. The Daggers' XO is closer, though, let's give him a shot.
What do you know about these pilots, Captain?
Tell me about the Daggers.
I know they got a raw deal. Those pilots were just doing their job, and they got locked up for it. Shameful.
Do you really trust inmates to round up other inmates?
You accept prisoners' help?
Far as I'm concerned, those pilots aren't inmates. Talk to any of 'em for five seconds, you'll know they never should've been sent here.
Their leader, Gall, is in a high-security zone, so I can't raise him on the holo for you. The XO isn't far, though--here.
Harlan? Harlan, come in, this is Zess, over.
Zess? Heh, good timing, pal. We need backup, ASAP--the Imps are opening the vaults!
Are they insane? We'll get you backup, Harlan, just hang in there!
Give me coordinates and I'll double-time it to your position.
Let me help.
Who is that? Forget it, I'll take anyone you've got.
What are these vaults you're talking about?
Vaults?
They were here on Belsavis when the prison was built. All we know is, what's in there is bad. We never open them.
Assemble all Dagger Wing personnel and report to me immediately, Harlan!
Drop everything and come back!
Who is that? Look, I'd love to get my people out of here, but that's not happening unless we get some backup.
We've got some Imps cornered in one of the vault entrances, but we're shot up pretty bad. We need medpacs and manpower, and we need them yesterday.
